TopicTitle: Vote: Which one is best scientific rover?

Articles.Content:
Hello guys, Poland here! For last four months I've been leading an awesome project: Polish Munar Base. This idea is easy: once every 5 days I'm starting an auction for a specified craft. For next 3 days everyone on forum can publish their candidate to project, and after these three days I'm starting up a poll. Candidate with most votes wins and get's into PMB save file. But now PMB is not only one base. In fact, it's two bases, two space stations, two probe systems (HYDRA for communication and OSZLA for constant power supply everywhere on Mun) and four outposts on Kerbin.

Shortened gallery of project:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Topic on forum (only in polish): http://forum.kerbale.pl/ladowniki-zalogowe-bazy-kolonie/p-m-b-polish-munar-base__ogloszenie-wynikow-gt-lazik-krotkiego-zasiegu/

Download save file (including KAS): https://www.dropbox.com/s/d2k2u81l4mm85bh/Polish%20Munar%20Base%20-%20Archiwum%20Startowe.rar

But why I'm telling to you this all? Because this time there is one huge action: for autonomous, independent rover that can work as mobile scientific base. There are three candidates, every one is awesome in it's own way:

Number one: Rude Boy 3

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Number two: Megathor

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Number three: Ker-Boat

Javascript is disabled. View full album

And this is the moment when you guys are coming to action. This time PMB is relying not only on forum poll, but also on your votes! Comment, vote and discuss, every idea or comment is valuable!

Thanks for reading, and sorry for English. It's not my native language ^^

Edited January 12, 2014 by DawsterTM
